name: Jikkyou Kyousouba Ikusei Simulation Game: Breeding Stud '99
overview: Breeding Stud '99 is the sequel to Breeding Stud 2 and the third and latest game in the Konami's horse breeding simulation game series for the Playstation One console in which the player is the owner of a ranch and he has to train his horses to win races and trophies that he can see in his trophy room. In the game the player can buy new horses, decide which food they will have each week, talk with the different trainers, check the stables, take the horses to the races and all with a 3d graphics engine in the races and in the ranch. At the beginning of the game he can choose the clothes colour of his jockey. As an improvement to Breeding Stud 2 that game features new betting modes and other new features. The game features a movie player (the opening movie is the only one avaliable at the beginning of the game), and stadium views.
